body:
HEY GUYS!!!!!

Recently we have had a big breakthrough in making competitive Minecraft a legit thing! Many of you who are active on the OCN forums may already know about this, but this subreddit is focused on making the competitive side of Minecraft PvP easily accessible to more players. It lists events that are taking place on dozens of servers around the world, and just how you can participate in them. Avicus may not have shown its own competitive side yet, but they are very welcome to start with the collaboration of these other servers. Avi mods and coordinators, I advise you to reach out to the leaders of this subreddit and leaders of other servers to start up. It may help Avicus gain a larger player base!

I do not take credit for this in any way, but it is my duty as a competitive Minecraft player to spread this message to any and all who would be interested! I hope to see many of you active on the forums and in game!

/r/CompetitiveMinecraft

Cratain's OCN Forum Post

Please guys, take this time to actually support something that could be big. I may not be a popular user on here, but I am trying to help. It takes seconds to upvote or comment, and you may find some very interesting gamemodes to try out. 

Also! Spread this to as many people as you can! So many people who play Minecraft have no idea that Minecraft PvP even exists. It is your duty to let them know!

Thanks!

Thanks!
title: /r/CompetitiveMinecraft - A PvP Community

replies.body: Ok, seriously guys. 43 people have looked at this and only one decided to say anything? I'm trying to help expand Avicus' horizons and kickstart the competitive play style to make Avicus great again! It takes seconds to respond, and even less to click the link and browse the subreddit.

replies.body: Higger sorry about what I posted last night. Reading it over in my head it sounded fine, but after reading it this morning and hearing how rude it sounded, I just want to apologize. At the time it seemed fine, but it really wasn't. I was being way too quick to judge, and whether or not I do enjoy other servers like OCN, I was being really rude. I hope no one was hurt or affected negetively by my comment, and once again I'm sorry for writing what I did. I feel that the way I disrespected you, I disrespected the whole community.
